definition: to seize the opportune moment/to lose no time

sentences.english: But the time may not be ripe.
sentences.chinese: 但是时机可能未必成熟。

sentences.english: Buy stocks when there is bloodshed in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街头溅血，就是买股票的时机。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: The end of the year is the best time to review and look ahead.
sentences.chinese: 年关是一个回顾和展望的好时机。

sentences.english: Quality image, brand name benefit, do the proven route, right-time & right-place development.
sentences.chinese: 树精品意识，创品牌效益，走规模道路，抢时机发展？

sentences.english: So now is a good time to take stock of IT’s most hated power couple.
sentences.chinese: 因此现在是清查这对最被痛恨的组合的好时机。

sentences.english: Then it has to choose the best mode and time to interject.
sentences.chinese: 最后，它还必须选择最佳的打扰模式与时机。

sentences.english: Sorceries and instants differ only in when they can be cast.
sentences.chinese: 巫术和瞬间的差异仅在使用的时机。

sentences.english: This is your chance to show off to the people interviewing you.
sentences.chinese: 这可是你向面试考官展现你自己的好时机。

sentences.english: Where ADD and other timing pathologies fit in the cycle.
sentences.chinese: 如果加上其他病症时机合适的周期。

sentences.english: A time to rassie the sails of your own beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 一个为你的的信仰而扬帆的的时机。

sentences.english: I will join in the assault upon Icecrown Citadel when the time to strike upon us.
sentences.chinese: 我将会在时机降临时加入攻打冰冠城塞的最后一战。

sentences.english: In the game of love, as in comedy, timing, they say, is everything.
sentences.chinese: 他们说爱情游戏就跟喜剧一样，时机的把握就是一切。

sentences.english: With Mark, we took a calculated risk with the pit-stop.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯，我们在他进站时机上计算出了风险。

sentences.english: As a community, this is the perfect time to clarify these differences.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个社区，这正是澄清所有这些区别的绝佳时机。

sentences.english: We continually be pleased to serve you at any time.
sentences.chinese: 如有时机为您服务，我们将私服感谢。

definition: timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to observe and make sure/to check
to grasp (also fig.)/to seize/to hold/assurance/certainty/sure (of the outcome)

pinyin: ji1 bu4 ke3 shi1 , shi2 bu4 zai4 lai2
